column1: The Purple Pig////Chicago hardly fails when it comes to good food. This is a nice upscale restaurant
column2: friendly front desk staff and server. The ladies seated beside me were having the Chicken Thigh Kebabs with Fried Smashed Potatoes and Tzatziki and raved about it so I ordered it. My only critique is that the top was over salted
column3: tapped the skewer on the plate a few times and it was ok.
